about_the_game:
This DLC includes

1) Full versions of Nameless game ending songs and MR (Total 6 tracks)
- The Song I Send to You (Yeonho & Lance Ending)
- Happy Love Song (Tei & Red Ending)
- Marionet (Yuri Ending)
2) Booklet with Lyrics
3) Making Film

If you have already purchased "Nameless Character Songs" in 2013 from Audio Comics, please contact Cheritz(help_en@cheritz.com) with a proof of purchase to get a free DLC key. The mp3 files are identical.
